name: TreeList_setTest
description: Unit tests for the set method of the TreeList class.

test_cases.name: testSetValidIndex
test_cases.description: Tests setting a value at a valid index in the TreeList.

test_cases.name: testSetInvalidIndex
test_cases.description: Tests setting a value at an invalid index in the TreeList, expecting an IndexOutOfBoundsException.

test_cases.name: testSetFirstIndex
test_cases.description: Tests setting a value at the first index in the TreeList.

test_cases.name: testSetLastIndex
test_cases.description: Tests setting a value at the last index in the TreeList.

test_cases.name: testSetEmptyList
test_cases.description: Tests setting a value in an empty TreeList, expecting an IndexOutOfBoundsException.
